## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and files generated by extensions.

# Build results
bin/
obj/
[Bb]uild/
[Ll]ogs/

# Visual Studio cache/options directory
.vs/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Auto-generated files
*_i.c
*_p.c
*_h.h
*.ilk
*.meta
*.obj
*.pch
*.pdb
*.pgc
*.pgd
*.rsp
*.sbr
*.tlb
*.tli
*.tlh
*.tmp
*.tmp_proj
*.log
*.vspscc
*_i.asm
*_p.asm

# Test results
TestResult*/
*.TestResults/

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
# The packages folder can be ignored because of package restore
**/packages/*
# except build/ and props/ from packages folder
!**/packages/build/
!**/packages/*.props
!**/packages/*.targets

# Visual Studio profiler
*.psess
*.vsp
*.vspx

# ReSharper files
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper

# Rider files
.idea/

# Other
*.dbmdl
*.bak
*.backup
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Publish
*.Publish.xml
publish/
